item.title: MindSet
item.description: Key Points Research suggests “Mindset” by Carol Dweck explores fixed and growth mindsets, impacting success and happiness, though individual impact may vary. The book seems likely to have chapters on mindset basics, ability, sports, business, relationships, parenting, and changing mindsets, with key insights on effort, learning, and resilience. The evidence leans toward daily practice of growth mindset strategies for maximum benefit, but controversy around mindset theories exists, with some debating their universality.
